subject: Series
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
Brain
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Over six months, The Times examined the life and death of Derek Boogaard. The last article of a three-part series details his decline, and the determination that he had a brain condition believed to be caused by repeated blows to the head.
snippet: Over six months, The Times examined the life and death of Derek Boogaard. The last article of a three-part series details his decline, and the determination that he had a brain condition believed to be caused by repeated blows to the head.
